member.name: IWICDdsEncoder.CreateNewFrame
member.summary: Creates a new frame to encode.
member.param: A pointer to the newly created frame object.
Points to the location where the array index is returned.
Points to the location where the mip level index is returned.
Points to the location where the slice index is returned.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDdsEncoder.GetParameters
member.param: Points to the structure where the information is returned.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDdsEncoder.SetParameters
member.param: Points to the structure where the information is described.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICDdsEncoder
member.summary: Enables writing DDS format specific information to an encoder.
